item.title: Understanding Knowledge Distillation
item.description: Core Idea General Architecture of a knowledge distillation setup The concept provides us an answer to the question if a smaller model can be made to perform as good as a large model on classification tasks . This question can be rephrased to distilling the knowledge of a larger model into a smaller model. The approach is outlined by the paper titled “Distilling the Knowledge in a Neural Network” 1.
